# isEnabledByDefault

**Type Property**

A device-dependent Boolean value that indicates whether a newly-instantiated drag interaction is allowed to participate in a drag activity.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var isEnabledByDefault: Bool { get }
```

## Enabling the interactions

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value that specifies whether the drag interaction responds to touches and is allowed to participate in a drag activity.
